name: juan-workflow
description: The non-engineer's development guardrails. A full dev lifecycle workflow — from spike to PR to review — built by a Head of Product who got tired of asking engineers for permission to ship.

plugins.name: juan-workflow
plugins.description: Full dev lifecycle orchestrator: spike planning in Linear, duplicate detection, implementation tracking, Greptile-gated PRs, and round-robin reviewer assignment. One command — /juan-is-working — handles the ceremony so you focus on the creative work.
